findings.title: approve
findings.description: The approve function allows unlimited approval if not properly validated.

findings.title: Transfer
findings.description: executes transfers of a specified number of tokens to a specified address

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in transferFrom function allowing a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account.

findings.title: Unprotected Permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is marked as external and has no access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected Swap Functions
findings.description: The swap functions do not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to perform swaps.

findings.title: Skim Finding
findings.description: The skim function has been marked as a potential security risk.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function is not protected against reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.
